page.title: 09Education in Ecchinswell
page.content: Young children can attend a daily {play group}held in the village hall or a{private day nursery}at Sydmonton. {Echinswell and Sydmonton Church of {England (controlled) Primary School has 70 pupils in the 5_11 age group.At present 10 of these are children of American airmen from the Greenham Base who are renting homes in the area. There are 3 classes with 3_5 teachers using 4 classrooms.With a falling birth-rate any expansion is unlikely. Some children attend Kingsclere Primary School and others travel to private schools in Newbury. For{secondary education}12_16 year olds attend the Clere School at Burghclere,which serves a catchment area of the surrounding villages.They travel by school coaches.A few children obtain state and private secondary education in Newbury.
